name: SWS Manage Items
upgrade_notice: Keeping up with the lastest version means fewer errors.
author: Sharon Stromberg

sections.description:
This plugin is creates a utility for managing uploads, videos, and links. It allows for...
  • Uploading via Gravity Forms
  • Displaying uploads by tag
  • Commenting on files

sections.shortcodes:
